item.title: Don’t Blame Brad Bondi for His Sister
item.description: The D.C. Bar election shouldn’t be about weaponizing it as an arm of politics.

item.title: Harvard’s Rough Lesson on the Costs of Government Meddling in Education
item.description: Freedom cannot be preserved by compromise with power. It must be safeguarded by principle.

item.title: Holland Remembers Nazi Horrors in Its New Holocaust Museum
item.description: The museum is small — in a Holocaust landmark building — direct, and packs a punch.

item.title: New York’s Welfare Rolls Are Swelling
item.description: The city has been backsliding in its commitment to move people from the dole to work.
